Order Fulfillment.heading: Effortless Orders, Happy Customers
Order Fulfillment.body: Orders flow directly from your online store to ERPNext, triggering automatic purchase order creation, inventory updates, and shipping label generation. No more manual data entry or messy spreadsheets!

Inventory Harmony.heading: Upgrade your inventory game with Real-time sync
Inventory Harmony.body: Real-time stock synchronization between your e-commerce platform and ERPNext ensures you never sell out unexpectedly. Say goodbye to overselling and frustrated customers!
